ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] bitz 53 cleric , fv, rp server
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello eveyrone just wondering if anyone plays on the Ayonae Ro server?  I d like to group and play with you guys..even though it ll be till mid November before
ygData.messageBody:
Hello eveyrone just wondering if anyone plays on the Ayonae Ro server? I'd
like to group and play with you guys..even though it'll be till mid November
before I can play again. Well talk to you people later!

-----Original Message-----
From: Gina Peterson [mailto:gina@...]
Sent: Monday, August 04, 2003 4:34 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] bitz 53 cleric , fv, rp server


> Just a note to say hello to you all, I hope there are some of the FV
> server players on, maybe we can run into each other sometimes, nice
> to meet you all.
> Bitz


Hello Bitz!

I play on FV! My one and only. :-) Pathfinder of 52 seasons, and always
happy to make a new friend. Maybe we'll run into each other!

~Kyndara Silverleaf~
Pathfinder of Karana,
Firiona Vie
<Circle of Sisters>
